plot: Virginia Lewis receives word from her relations in the city that her grandfather has left his entire estate to her, providing she claims it within a certain date. She prepares to go to town...
title: The Man from the City
plot_es: Virginia Lewis receives word from her relations in the city that her grandfather has left his entire estate to her, providing she claims it within a certain date. She prepares to go to town...
plot_en: Virginia Lewis receives word from her relations in the city that her grandfather has left his entire estate to her, providing she claims it within a certain date. She prepares to go to town...
